member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.MorphologyEffect
member.summary: Thins or thickens edge boundaries in an image. This effect uses a filter kernel that is 2 times the size you specify. The kernel is centered on the pixel being calculated, and returns the maximum value in the kernel (if dilating) or minimum value (if eroding).

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Morphology effect.
